text: Horror Epics is the fourth studio album by Scottish punk rock band, The Exploited. Horror Epics was released on April 15th 1985. The album was re- released in 2004 on the Captain Oi! label. Allmusic rated the album 2 stars out of 5. ==Songs== Side one Side two Re-release bonus tracks ==References== Category:1985 albums Category:The Exploited albums Category:Punk albums
title: Horror Epics
